## Tender Description
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requires the recruitment of an external project monitor for the following projects: 
    - Adaptation and Valorization of Entrepreneurship in Irrigated Agriculture (AVENIR)
    - Resilient Women and Agriculture (FAR)
    - Improving Access to Agricultural Insurance in the Casamance Region in Senegal (RESILIENCE)

The project monitor will be responsible for overseeing the implementation of these projects in Senegal. The ideal candidate should have experience in project management and a strong understanding of agricultural projects.
